page.title: 13Southend:School life 3
page.content:
Some of the girls sing songs,this is one of them. {My Boyfriend {____________ My boyfriend gave me apples, My boyfriend gave me pears, My boyfriend gave me a kiss on the lips, And kicked me down the stairs.
I gave him back his apples, I gave him back his pears, I gave him back his kiss on the lips And kicked HIM down the stairs.
Every year,at the end of term,the 4th years have an oppurtunity to go on{holiday}for a week with some of the teachers.Over the past 5 years,the places they have visited have been {Wales and Lyme Regis,}which is on the south coast.
